JSON.parse(userAuthString) : null; const createdAtAsDate = new Date(userAuth.userFound.createdAt); const createdAtDate = createdAtAsDate.toDateString(); const {userProfile , getUserProfile } = useContext(authContext); const userId = userAuth.userFound._id ; const rating = 3 ; const left = 2 ; useEffect(()=>{ getUserProfile(userId); },[userId,getUserProfile]); return (
{userProfile.profilePicture ? ( ):(
